name: Userbot - Telegram Chatwars player userbot
description: A modular Telegram Userbot running on Python 3.9

ENV.description: Fill this if you using environ variable as config.

USERBOT_SESSION.description: Generate String from Heroku Shell by running 'bash genStr' after you deploy, Set this value later after genrating the string if you dont have. Make sure you choose option 1 since you are here to use it for userbot :)
